title: FOIA Document for Vaccine Discussion as to mRNA-based Vaccine Safety Signals

opengraph.description: by Steve KirschRecently I shared the interpretation, based on the data disclosed in the CDC VAERS safety database, that the rates of death reported associated with the mRNA-based vaccines were up to 100X the data for all influenza vaccine data for the past decade. That video can be viewed under TrialSite's OpEd here. I also discussed what could be triggering these safety signals including an artifact produced from a freedom of information act (FOIA) request for Pfizer's vaccine in Japan.
